name: film-tools
title: Film Tools
description: Quick access to film information, developing times, dilutions, and more!
author: narrowstacks

commands.name: film-search
commands.title: Film Search
commands.subtitle: Search for film types
commands.description: Find and view types of films from various brands.

commands.name: dilution-calculator
commands.title: Dilution Calculator

commands.description: Calculate a chemical mixture dilution in ml or fl oz

preferences.name: volumeUnit
preferences.title: Volume Unit

preferences.name: defaultNotation
preferences.title: Default Notation
preferences.description: Choose the default notation type for simple ratios (e.g., '31 500' becomes either '1+31' or '1:31')

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
